promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young legendary goat steel-type pokemon wearing metallic gemstones. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or goat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Glorefrost, a a chibi young legendary goat steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Boiling Impact, Altered Creation-GX. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "goat", "steel" or "Glorefrost". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, goat-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey shadows
generatedDescription: This young chibi legend, a reflection of sturdy metal, is found in lofty terrains. With Boiling Impact and Altered Creation-GX, it shapes destiny, one horn thrust at a time.
